rows.label: tev032101_MSG1001
rows.name:
The anti-aircraft turrets targeting our ship are in three
different places, all right? So make sure you you
destroy them all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG1002
rows.name:
Normally, a few turrets would be no threat to us at
all, you know? But the surprise landing has made all
our countermeasures go haywire...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Pfeffen about the Ma-non.

rows.label: tev032101_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Pfeffen if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Pfeffen about recent developments.

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0001
rows.name:
Myself, Rutantan, and Tutura are the Ma-non's
delegates on this particular voyage, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0002
rows.name:
Rutantan is sort of like our manager, I suppose?
He oversees our technology and decides who to to
dispatch where, at any rate.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0003
rows.name:
Tutura is more like the business leader, you might say?
He sells the tech that we build via Candid & Credible.
He's also pretty good at it, don't you agree?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0004
rows.name:
As for me, I have taken it upon myself to immerse
myself in your culture by sampling your pizzas and
engaging in casual chats like like like this one![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0008
rows.name:
Hey, [ST:playername ]! You've really
impressed us with your attitude, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0009
rows.name:
Now that we're all friends, you're free to walk around
our ship. Er, if you want...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0010
rows.name:
But if you do walk around, I suppose you should talk
to to every last Ma-non and help the ones in trouble.
That's what friends are for, isn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0011
rows.name: So the Prone have moved to the city, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0012
rows.name:
We went ahead and and opened up the port side of
the ship so they have a place to live, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0013
rows.name:
Well, I hope they don't find it too too claustrophobic.
It used to be our storage area, so there are still a
bunch of containers floating around, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0014
rows.name: So the Orphe have moved to the city, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0015
rows.name:
They said they need to be surrounded by plants in
order to feel at home, so we sort of...borrowed some
of your human pots and planters for the ship?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0016
rows.name:
It sure is nice to be one with nature, isn't it?
Do you think we could maybe grow a huge tree right
here on our ship?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0017
rows.name: So the Zaruboggan have moved to the city, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0018
rows.name:
Apparently they eat garbage and waste products and
basically everything we DON'T want on the ship?
I think I like them already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0019
rows.name:
Our disposal bills are going to go way way down.
It's a win-win, as you humans say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0020
rows.name: So the Wrothians have moved to the city, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0021
rows.name:
I was worried they might find life on our ship boring,
you know? I mean, since they pretty much just want to
fight all the time...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0022
rows.name:
But their so-called "meditation" and training have been
keeping them plenty occupied, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0023
rows.name:
And I must admit, their mock battles can be very...
entertaining?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0024
rows.name:
The Ma-non ship has brightened up quite a bit thanks
to to all our new xenoform neighbors, don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0025
rows.name:
Everyone was worried we might not get along, right?
But soon we learned they were just as nervous as us,
and we were able to break the proverbial ice...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0026
rows.name:
We owe these new friendships to to you,
[ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev032101_MSG0027
rows.name:
I wish I could reward you, but instead I will give you
a big Ma-non smile and a pat on the back, all right?
...Good. There there.[ST:wait ]
